statements: DELETE FROM user_activity_logs WHERE user_id = 100 AND action = 'login';
DELETE FROM user_activity_logs WHERE timestamp < '2022-01-01' AND user_id = 200;
DELETE FROM system_usage_logs WHERE user_id = 123 AND accessed_resources = 'Sensitive Data';
DELETE FROM SystemAccessLogs WHERE user_id = 101 AND timestamp < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM SecurityChangeLogs WHERE change_id = 500 AND timestamp > '2022-06-01';
DELETE FROM user_activity_logs WHERE user_id = 101 AND activity_type = 'login';
DELETE FROM security_changes WHERE change_timestamp < '2022-01-01' AND change_type = 'password_reset';
